title: Am I for Real
lyrics:
I sesang-eun CRAZY
I dosineun eojileobgie
Nan suljalileul jul-ine
Nan nae gajog-eul wihal ppun-ine
Sin-eun midji anhgie
Nae jasin-eul midgo gaji maeil

Daehanmingug yeon-yein-eun jeoldae gajyeoseoneun an dwae jeongchisaeg

Milaeui na-ege

Jom deo tteostteoshal su issge

Deo isang-ui MISTAKE

Hamyeon andwae mwodeun ANYWAY

Netijeundeul-ui agpeul-eun nal deoug himdeulge hae

Amudo naega jaldoeji anhgil balaneun deushae

Mwodeun swiun geon eobsji

Nae salm-eun eodubjiman hangsang balg-ge salji

POSITIVE VIBE POSITIVE MIND

Saebyeog nae jag-eobsil-eun OASIS machi

MORE CAFFEINE MORE CAFFEINE

COFFEEwa RED BULLeun nal kkaewo juji ROCKIN

Meoli meoli sog-e MONEY MONEYleul jiwoya hae

Nae changjag-eul banghaehaneun jabonjuui FUCK IT

Kamelaga kkeojin kanibal sog-e nan daleun salam-i

Doen geos gat-eun neukkim-i deul-eo

Dambaeleul mulgo INSTAGRAMsog-en

Nae salm-i anin geos gat-eun haengboghan seong-won-i

AM I FOR REAL, AM I FOR REAL

Kamelaga kkeojin kanibal sog-e nan daleun salam-i

Doen geos gat-eun neukkim-i deul-eo

Dambaeleul mulgo INSTAGRAMsog-en

Nae salm-i anin geos gat-eun haengboghan seong-won-i

AM I FOR REAL, AM I FOR REAL

Ya bang-yong-gug-i neon oneul nuguni

Ul-eum-i meomchugo bul-i kkeojimyeon goemul-i doeneuni

Geunyang jug-eo geuge deo pyeonhaji

Aghago chuhan nom-i tto mwol deo sal-eo

Neoui salang-eul neukkil su issge

Balg-eun bich sog-eseo neol deo kkyeoan-eo

Eojji salang ttawiga neol guwon hal su issgessni

Ingan ingan ingan aghan geosdeul-i

Seon ag-eul gyujeonghani won

Jeung-owa myeolsi bunnowa bogsu

Geu sangsilgam-i dolaedoeeo

Neon honjaga doego negen amudo eobsji

Nugudo neol ihae hal su eobsgie

Saebyeog-i dwaeya honjaga doeneun galodeung-eul wilohae

Gayeoun yeonghondeul-eul pumneun cheonsadeul-egen

Yag-i jom deo pil-yohae

Bilog nae du gilo-e seoissneun

Geudeul-ege na ganjeolhi gidohae

I michin sesang-eseo michiji

Anhgoseoya nal eojji wilohae

Kamelaga kkeojin kanibal sog-e nan daleun salam-i

Doen geos gat-eun neukkim-i deul-eo

Dambaeleul mulgo INSTAGRAMsog-en

Nae salm-i anin geos gat-eun haengboghan seong-won-i

AM I FOR REAL, AM I FOR REAL

Kamelaga kkeojin kanibal sog-e nan daleun salam-i

Doen geos gat-eun neukkim-i deul-eo

Dambaeleul mulgo INSTAGRAMsog-en

Nae salm-i anin geos gat-eun haengboghan seong-won-i

AM I FOR REAL, AM I FOR REAL

Jinjjaleul wihae geulae jinjjadeul wie mwoga issneunji

Bogo sip-eo baldwikkumchileul deul-eo gansinhi teog-eul geol-eo

Neom-eobon geugos-eun jan-inhae

Jachegeom-yeol nun-eul gam-a ajig eolyeo

Ani geuleon mal-eul hagien

Nan sangtuleul teul-eoss-eo don-ilang gyeolhon nan honjaga anyeo

Oeloum-eun han seupundo an deol-eoss-eo

Tongjang-en gong nae mam-en gongheoleul neol-eo

Nalkalobnya neon wae ileohge byeonhaess-eo jomman hadeon ge

Ya jamkkan jeonhwa jom badge

Dam-e yaegihaja FUCKIN ni yaegin

Moduga jiltuleul ti naeji

Anim naega yemin LIKE TEEN AGE

Nae jalmos-eul hanbeonman bwajwola

Geunyang ani mwo geunyang geuleohdago nae yaegin

Geunyang dwo jebal nado naleul

Mos goelobhyeo andal-inde neokkaji wae geulae

Ani naege haneun mal-inikka geunyang dwo

Saeng-gagbodan nan ajig ansimhae

Yeojeonhi munjeneun yolam-inde

Jeongdab-eun mudeom insaeng sichaga neomu simhae

Nan yeojeonhi nainde mom-i neomu chagawo

Sichelo galaanj-eun simhae

DON’T YOU KNOW YA

I'M PARANOID YA

INSOMNIA

I FEEL DOWN, I FEEL DOWN YEAH

DON’T YOU KNOW YA

I'M PARANOID YA

INSOMNIA

I FEEL DOWN, I FEEL DOWN YEAH
